Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Le Calette in Cefalu (Cefalu Coast), you'll be minutes from Caldura Beach and close to Rocca of Cefalu. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Temple of Diana and Salita Saraceno Staircase.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 55 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with queen sofa beds. Rooms have private patios. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments and facials. You can soak up the sun at the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities including a nightclub and a health club. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and shopping on site. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a beach bar, or a poolside bar. A complimentary full breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Cefalu? This hotel has 1076 square feet (100 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a beach bar, or a poolside bar. A complimentary full breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Le Calette in Cefalu (Cefalu Coast), you'll be minutes from Caldura Beach and close to Rocca of Cefalu. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Temple of Diana and Salita Saraceno Staircase.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Caldura Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Rocca of Cefalu - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Temple of Diana - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Salita Saraceno Staircase - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Osteria Magno - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Palazzo Atenasio Martino - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Church of Purgatory - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Cefalu Cathedral - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Palazzo Piraino - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Museo Mandralisca - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Santa Maria dell'Odigitria - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Lavatoio Medievale - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Cefalu Beach - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Sanctuary of Gibilmanna - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Kartodromo Lascari - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi

The preferred airport for Le Calette is Palermo (PMO-Punta Raisi) - 83.2 km / 51.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
